sub_title: Postdoctoral Research Fellow at The Janssen Pharmaceutical Companies of Johnson & Johnson
summary: I’m an optimistic, curious, and results-driven interdisciplinary engineer with broad interests and a constant drive to learn and improve. I’m comfortable taking the lead and actively work on leadership development of myself and others. People describe me as having an open personality and particularly value my critical and strategic thinking. In teams, I’m a strong connector and keep the team focused on achieving our goals. I’m generally comfortable in unknown situations and enjoy finding and implementing unconventional solutions for tough problems.
